Config.1: This is the configuration file for Utopia. You can change the settings here to customize your server.
Config.1.1: If any value is left empty, it will be loaded from hard-coded default ones.
Config.1.2: Please make sure you provide valid values for any settings that require them.
Config.1.3: OsuApiKey is not required but should be present for full functionality.
Config.1.4: REMEMBER TO ALSO CHANGE SETTINGS IN .ENV FILE.
Config.2: By default server checks if client osu version is up-to-date. If you don't want to check this, set it to false.
Config.3: Statuses are updated in minutely intervals so this value should be set between 1-59.
Config.RestrictedMessage:
You've been restricted. You can't access any online features on this server until restrictions are lifted.
Please contact support for more information
Config.4: This is for banner that is on the bottom of main menu in osu!. These values are links
Config.5: This is for statuses that you can see in osu! client. You can set multiple statuses by separating them with comma.
Config.5.1: Valid statuses are: Online, AFK, Playing, Editing, Modding, Multiplayer, Watching, Idle, Testing, Submitting, Paused, Lobby, Multiplaying, Target, Unknown
Config.5.2: Example: Submitting:a pull request..,Editing:the source code..
